title: Sitemap Extractor Output
description: Each item represents a URL discovered in a sitemap and the result of a HEAD request. Failed requests may contain only error/debug metadata.

status.title: Status code
status.description: HTTP status code from the HEAD request.

#error.title: Error flag
#error.description: True if the request failed after retries.

#debug.title: Debug info
#debug.description: Request debug info (id, retry count, errors, etc.).
